column4: i run xubuntu. i have kdm installed as the window manager. i want to use gdm. how do i change it over? i looked at a x11 config file and didn't see where to change it
why are u using kdm on xubuntu? doesn't it defeat the purpose of using xfce?
'cause i also have kde installed for whenever i want to use it
anyway the point is i want to ditch kdm
